ingredients: 1 (0.6 ounce) cake compressed fresh yeast, 1 cup lukewarm milk, 2   +   1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 large egg,   +   3/4 cup dried currants,   +   3/4 cup raisins, 1 medium Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and finely chopped, 1 quart vegetable oil for deep-frying, 1 cup confectioners' sugar for dusting
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 11%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 17mg 6%, Sodium 405mg 18%, Total Carbohydrate 46g 17%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 1mg 7%, Calcium 44mg 3%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 240mg 5%
